actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating certain rivers for study as potential additions to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates specified rivers in the States of Michigan, New Mexico, Utah, Colorado, Illinois, Arkansas, Oklahoma, California, New Jersey, North Carolina, Virginia, West Virginia, Wyoming, Washington, Texas, Oregon, North Dakota, Florida, Nebraska, Louisiana, Mississippi, Wisconsin, Montana, Alaska, Georgia, and Arizona for study as potential additions to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating certain rivers for study as potential additions to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
